channel.title: Deobs
channel.description:
Ive been able to get my deob to connect and everything its just after a few seconds of running i cannot perform any actions. Is this some new trap that I have to remove before i can run or something? I have fiddled with the arguments to no avail and I don't think I really know enough about the client to go rooting to find the source of the problem. Anyone have any ideas?
[b]args:[/b] [code]java -jar output.jar 15 live live lowmem free english game1;[/code]
[b]edited lines:[/b] [code] Class37_Sub8.aString1940 = "mn2.runescape.com"; [/code]
in the init() and main() methods.

item.title: Deobs
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

[quote=“zenteo, post:10, topic:156509”]Can i use ex at2.runescape.com and use world 3 instead of 34 in the args without ban?
If not, it will be hard to make a worldswitcher.[/quote]
Using a deob will get you banned, unless you do modifications to the code at runtime. If you want to make a world switcher, try using BCEL.

Read full topic

item.title: Deobs
item.dc:creator: @zenteo zenteo
item.description:
@zenteo wrote:

vbcoderx:

those are world urls, idk which server is which world atm, but use the server url of the world u want… like world 34 is at2.runescape.com

Can i use ex at2.runescape.com and use world 3 instead of 34 in the args without ban?
If not, it will be hard to make a worldswitcher.

Read full topic

item.title: Deobs
item.dc:creator: @zenteo zenteo
item.description:
@zenteo wrote:

I have a question:
Both of these IPs/Domains are working, but witch should I use?
mn2.runescape.com
jolt1.runescape.com

Read full topic

item.title: Deobs
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

[quote=“r4ndom1, post:6, topic:156509”][quote author=_cake link=topic=213524.msg1864639#msg1864639 date=1194127346]

with game0 as the argument it appears i am alowed 1 action per login and with a little tom foolery a few more but it is by no means normal.

current args

java -jar output.jar 15 live live lowmem free english game0;

no change of code

Why is it ‘game0;’ instead of ‘game0’.
[/quote]

well thats a line from my shell script and i have been having trouble with not including ;s lately so added that to all the lines and solved a few problems. But seen as its the last line i might as well edit.
brb with my results.

edit: oh tyvm that worked :)[/quote]
Your welcome.
Pity me for not realizing that earlier.
The client doesn’t recognize game0; as a valid game id argument.

Read full topic

current args

no change of code
[/quote]
Why is it ‘game0;’ instead of ‘game0’.[/quote]

well thats a line from my shell script and i have been having trouble with not including ;s lately so added that to all the lines and solved a few problems. But seen as its the last line i might as well edit.
brb with my results.

edit: oh tyvm that worked

item.title: Deobs
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

The ‘game1’ argument does not allow movement or I believe clicking on objects etc. It is used for testing purposes as is ‘::errortest’.

Read full topic

Ive been able to get my deob to connect and everything its just after a few seconds of running i cannot perform any actions. Is this some new trap that I have to remove before i can run or something?
